H0.text: Moroni is the capital of which Indian Ocean island group. Seychelles

H1.text: Moroni is the capital of which Indian Ocean island group. Maldives

H2.text: Moroni is the capital of which Indian Ocean island group. Mauritius

H3.text: Moroni is the capital of which Indian Ocean island group. COMOROS

A4.text: The capital and largest city, Moroni, is located on Ngazidja.
